column4: k my noob friend just chmod 700 his /usr.  Is there any way I can fix it with the Live Cd or something?
not him, I will do that and ask from there
ok im in the chmod 700 /usr machine
done already of course with sudo /D
hello. It didnt work prolly because it didnt mount my filesystem. It is the livecd system that is loaded
what do you mean by that?
are you back on the live cd, or have you realised what you needed to do? and fixed it?
I did the chmod etc but it didnt work. When I boot with the file cd, my home directory is diferent for example
I realized that I have toi chmod it back, but this is not my filesystem
I have to mount it ro something, im looking for it right now
it is prolly the right thing now, ty
